text: Willow is a 1988 American dark fantasy drama movie directed by George Lucas and co-directed by Ron Howard. It was produced by Nigel Wooll and written by George Lucas and Bob Dolman. It stars Warwick Davis, Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Jean Marsh, and Billy Barty. ==Release== ===Home media=== VHS on November 22, 1988 by MGM/UA Home Video and had MGM Home Entertainment re- released the film on VHS and on DVD for "special edtion" to THX and THX Optimizer in November 2001. ==References== Category:1988 fantasy movies Category:1988 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ron Howard Category:Movies composed by James Horner Category:American fantasy movies Category:American drama movies
title: Willow (movie)
